EmailTemplate.name: NUR-2021FY-LEAD-GEN-FOLLOW-UP-PROGRAM.Kris - 3B
EmailTemplate.subject: Embrace the Rise of Virtual Care: Teladoc Health
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Hello}},
I am Kris Floyd with Teladoc Health, and I want to thank you for your interest in Teladoc Health. As a follow-up and for your review, I'm sharing a Teladoc Health Experience Video (https://view.highspot.com/viewer/606b3bc7628ba234a5aa4bde) (90 seconds).
For the opportunity to ask any initial questions you may have, feel free to directly schedule our 15-minute call here: https://calendly.com/krisfloyd/15-minute-teladoc-chat
Learn more about Teladoc Health benefits: • Comprehensive care — Telehealth Services can resolve a broad array of needs, including general medical services, mental healthcare, dermatology and more. • Convenience — Members have 24/7 access by web, phone, or our award-winning mobile app. • Clinical quality — The U.S. board-certified physicians in our network have an average of 20 years' experience and deliver the highest quality care.
In good health, Kris
Kris Floyd Lead Development Representative Teladoc Health, Inc.
O (855) 549-2214 | C (830) 734–3138 kris.floyd@teladochealth.com
